overview:
Brent Grablachoff is the Owner and Coach of www.kickingworld.com a company he founded in 2003. He branched away from working at technology, financial, and software sales companies to focus on running his startup. Brentâ€™s passion for the internet, developing trends, and emerging technology has always provided an added value to any of his careers. Brent has years of experience in technology sales and software sales and was Business Development Executive at Endavo Media and responsible for driving sales of their OTT Video Services Platform. Prior to joining Endavo Media, Brent was the Director of Sales & Marketing for Monetize Media; an Online Video Platform company focusing on live streaming video delivery. Previous to Endavo and Monetize Media, Grablachoff’s experience includes sales & marketing positions at Fortune 500 companies including CDW, Honda, and Merrill Lynch.

Brent’s true passion is growing his business- KickingWorld.com which provides national football kicking camps and private instruction for youth, high school, and college athletes. As a former 1â€™st team All-American college football athlete, Brent remains active in the community as a volunteer coach. He received a B.S. in Marketing from Montclair State University in New Jersey; where he was born and raised before moving to Southern California in 2007. He lives and works in San Diego, CA. Brent enjoys golfing, bowling, dining, fishing, being outdoors, fitness, technology, and the internet.
